A vvorlde of wordes, or Most copious, and exact dictionarie in Italian and English, collected by Iohn Florio Vocabolario italiano & inglese Florio, John, 1553?-1625.
[20], 462, [2] p.
By Arnold Hatfield for Edw. Blount, Printed at London : 1598.
The first leaf and the last leaf are blanks. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
